author: Shiv R
content:
Small eatery but the food is tasty and also budget-friendly, making it a great choice for diners looking for delicious meals. It's a popular choice among budget-conscious students, food enthusiasts visitors looking to try Indian/Pakistani food.

Had the rice and three curries. It was wonderful and tasty. Portion size was reasonable. We also did a takeaway after our dinner.

The seating is small but that's the best part to make good conversation.
